ingredients.content: 300 g fresh spinach leaves, roughly chopped as necessary
200 g onions, cut in pieces (3 cm)
250 g carrots, cut in pieces (3 cm)
100 g turnips, cut in pieces (3 cm) (optional)
1 pinch ground black pepper, adjust to taste

preparations.content: Place Varoma dish on mixing bowl lid, weigh spinach into it and set aside.
Place dried chickpeas in mixing bowl and grind <b>30 sec/speed 9<b>.
Add 400 g water and mix <b>15 sec/speed 4<b>. Scrape sides and bottom of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add onions, olive oil, carrots, turnips (if using), garlic, salt and black pepper then chop <b>8 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add remaining 400 g water. Place Varoma into position and cook <b>30 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Set Varoma aside.
Insert measuring cup and blend <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 4<b>-7, increasing speed gradually.<b> Add steamed spinach, combine with spatula, adjust seasoning then serve immediately.
